#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int rev(int num)
{int pow,sum,c;
    pow=1;
    sum=0;
    while(num%10==0)
    num=num/10;
    while(num>=pow)
    {
        c=(num/pow)%10;
        sum=(sum*10)+c;
        pow*=10;
    }
    return sum;
}

int main() {
int T,a,b,sum;
scanf("%d",&T);
while(T--)
{
    scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
    a=rev(a);
    b=rev(b);
    sum=a+b;
    sum=rev(sum);
    printf("%d\n",sum);
}
	
	// your code here

	return 0;
}
